title: Vertex Media cinematic black-and-white marketing site (frontend)

requirements.summary: Create a cohesive high-end black/white design system with consistent typography, spacing, and button styles across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent header, footer, typography scale, and spacing system.
Primary and secondary buttons are visually consistent across pages.
No default/unstyled template UI remains (overall look feels intentionally designed).

file_operations.description: Create the app stylesheet imported by the immutable frontend/src/main.tsx; include a minimal cinematic black/white design system (typography scale, spacing rules, button/link treatments) and import/compose from existing Tailwind setup where appropriate.
Extend Tailwind theme tokens (fonts/letter-spacing/containers as needed) to support the bold, minimal, grid-based cinematic aesthetic across pages.
Create a shared layout wrapper that enforces consistent grid/container spacing and applies the global typographic rhythm across all pages.
Create a small wrapper component for consistent primary/secondary CTA styling using shadcn-ui Button as the base. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement client-side routing with a shared header navigation and footer across Home, Services, About, Join Our Network, and Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page is reachable via header navigation without full page reload.
Footer appears on all pages and includes social link placeholders (e.g., Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube).

file_operations.description: Implement the root app router and route table for Home, Services, About, Join Our Network, and Contact; wrap routes with the shared SiteLayout so header/footer appear site-wide.
Create the header navigation component with links to all required pages and styling consistent with the cinematic black/white design system.
Create the footer component that appears on all pages, includes nationwide positioning copy, and contains social link placeholders (Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube).
Wire the new SiteHeader and SiteFooter into the shared layout so all routed pages consistently render them.

requirements.summary: Build the Home page with hero, exact tagline, above-the-fold CTAs, authority section, services overview, and portfolio preview.
acceptanceCriteria: Tagline text matches exactly: “From Coast to Coast, We Capture It All”.
Both CTAs are visible above the fold on typical desktop widths.
Home includes distinct sections for authority, services overview, and portfolio preview.

file_operations.description: Create the Home page with: strong hero headline; exact tagline text “From Coast to Coast, We Capture It All”; prominent CTAs labeled “Book a Shoot” and “Join the Network”; an authority section about nationwide expansion/curated network; a services overview section; and a portfolio preview section.
Ensure the CTA wrapper supports both primary and secondary variants appropriate for the Home hero CTAs using shadcn-ui Button. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register/wire the HomePage route so it is reachable from navigation and loads without full page reload.

requirements.summary: Create the Services page with six scannable service offerings and confident national-agency copy.
acceptanceCriteria: All six services are listed and easy to scan (cards/sections).
Copy reads as a national agency offering (not a local freelancer).

file_operations.description: Create a Services page that clearly presents: Sports Media Production, Athlete Highlights, Brand Content, Event Coverage, Monthly Retainers, Nationwide Contributor Network; use a card/section layout with concise, confident national-agency tone.
Register/wire the ServicesPage route and ensure it appears in header navigation.

requirements.summary: Create the About page emphasizing coast-to-coast vision, structured systems/quality control, and built-for-growth positioning.
acceptanceCriteria: About page includes explicit messaging for all three bullets (vision, systems/quality, growth).
Layout remains minimal, bold, and high-end consistent with the design system.

file_operations.description: Create an About page with explicit sections for (1) coast-to-coast vision, (2) structured systems & quality control, and (3) built-for-growth positioning, in a minimal, bold, high-end layout.
Register/wire the AboutPage route and ensure it appears in header navigation.

requirements.summary: Create the Join Our Network page with curated-approval messaging and an application form that submits and shows a success state.
acceptanceCriteria: Join Our Network page clearly communicates curated approvals and national opportunity.
Application form includes fields: name, email, location/market, specialties, portfolio link, message.
Submitting the form shows a success confirmation state in the UI.

file_operations.description: Create the Join Our Network page with contributor-focused messaging (curated approvals + national opportunity) and an application form containing: name, email, location/market, specialties, portfolio link, short message; include an on-submit success confirmation UI state.

Create a small frontend helper that uses the existing actor hook to call backend submitNetworkApplication and normalizes form values (including any optional handling needed on the frontend) for the Join Network submission.
Register/wire the JoinNetworkPage route and ensure it appears in header navigation and is reachable without full page reload.

requirements.summary: Create the Contact page with inquiry form, nationwide operations messaging, and social links; submit and show a success state.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page includes the inquiry form, nationwide operations message, and social link placeholders.
Submitting the inquiry form shows a success confirmation state in the UI.

file_operations.description: Create the Contact page with (1) inquiry form fields: name, email, company/organization (optional), project type, desired date (optional), budget range (optional), message; (2) nationwide operations messaging; and (3) social link placeholders; include an on-submit success confirmation UI state.
Add frontend capability to submit Contact inquiries via backend submitContact, mapping optional fields to null as required by the backend interface.
Register/wire the ContactPage route and ensure it appears in header navigation.

requirements.summary: Add a cinematic grayscale Portfolio preview section on Home using curated placeholder items with captions.
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio preview shows multiple items with titles/captions and grayscale visuals.
Portfolio section styling matches the black/white high-end theme.

file_operations.description: Create a PortfolioPreview component that renders multiple curated placeholder items (sports, brand, events, etc.) with concise captions and consistent grayscale visual treatment aligned to the black/white design system.
Wire the PortfolioPreview component into the Home page as the portfolio preview section (distinct from hero/authority/services sections).

requirements.summary: Render the generated static hero background, wordmark, and portfolio thumbnails from frontend/public/assets/generated on the Home page.
acceptanceCriteria: Images are loaded as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated (not served from the backend).
Home hero and portfolio preview visibly use the generated assets.

file_operations.description: Wire the generated static assets into the Home hero and branding: use frontend/public/assets/generated/vertex-hero-bg.dim_2400x1350.png as a hero background visual and frontend/public/assets/generated/vertex-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png as the typographic wordmark image.

Render the six generated grayscale thumbnails as portfolio visuals: frontend/public/assets/generated/vertex-portfolio-01.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vertex-portfolio-02.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vertex-portfolio-03.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vertex-portfolio-04.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vertex-portfolio-05.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vertex-portfolio-06.dim_1200x800.png.
